SELECT CONT.*, USR.USER_NAME AS USERHISNAME, SC.COMP_NAME AS CUSTHISNAME, INSP.INSP_DT, INSP.INSP_USER_NAME, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO) <= (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_INSP_ITEM WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO AND ASSET_YN = 'N') THEN '미자산 품목' WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO) THEN '' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO AND ASSET_STATUS_CD = '가자산') THEN '일부완료' ELSE '검수완료' END) AS INSP_STATUS_CD_STR, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_CONTRACT_DTL WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO) <= (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_INSP_ITEM WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO AND ASSET_YN = 'N') THEN '4' WHEN NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO) THEN '1' WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RFID_ASSET WHERE PURNO = CONT.PURNO AND ASSET_STATUS_CD = '가자산') THEN '2' ELSE '3' END) AS INSP_STATUS_CD_ORD FROM RFID_CONTRACT CONT LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_USER USR ON CONT.USERHISNO = USR.USER_HIS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN RFID_SL_COMPANY SC ON CONT.CUSTHISNO = SC.COMP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT PURNO, MAX(INSP_DT) INSP_DT, MAX(INSP_USER_NAME) INSP_USER_NAME FROM RFID_INSP_ASSET GROUP BY PURNO ) INSP ON CONT.PURNO = INSP.PURNO WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY INSP_STATUS_CD_ORD ASC, PURNO DESC
